trans-unit.source: Converts objects to and from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Konvertálja az objektumot, a egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert an object of the specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"> </xref> válthat a megadott típusú objektumot egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref>, a megadott környezet használatával.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64>
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64></xref:System.UInt64></xref:System.UInt32></xref:System.UInt16></xref:System.Int64></xref:System.Int32></xref:System.Int16></xref:System.Double></xref:System.Single></xref:System.Decimal></xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength></xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter>

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: A próbaverzióról típusa.

trans-unit.source: true if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert the specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: értéke TRUE, ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"> </xref> válthat a megadott típus egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref>; esetén pedig false.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"> </xref> alakíthatja át egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref> a megadott típusra.

trans-unit.source: The CanConvertTo method returns `true` if `destinationType` is <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: A CanConvertTo metódus visszaadja `true` Ha `destinationType` vagy <xref:System.String> <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, CanConvertTo returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben adja vissza CanConvertTo `false`.

trans-unit.target: Egy objektum, amely egy formátum környezetet biztosít.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A típus konvertálása.

trans-unit.target: A megadott objektum alakít egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64> Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method before calling the ConvertFrom to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter>alakíthatja át a következő típusok egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:- <xref:System.String>- <xref:System.Decimal>- <xref:System.Single>- <xref:System.Double>- <xref:System.Int16>- <xref:System.Int32>- <xref:System.Int64>- <xref:System.UInt16>- <xref:System.UInt32>- <xref:System.UInt64>hívja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>metódus hívása a ConvertFrom elkerülése érdekében egy kivétel kiváltása előtt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter>
